UnicornFlix - Video on Demand.info: In this workshop we will build the video on demand streaming platform that allows you to upload, process, and serve videos to authenticated users.

Create-react-app with AWS Amplify Auth.info: This auth starter implements withAuthenticator HOC to provide a basic authentication flow for signing up signing in users as well as protected client side routing using AWS Amplify. Auth features: User sign up, User sign in, Multi-factor Authentication, User sign-out.
